author: Iris Lopez
title: These 2 Texas Cities Just Made the Dirtiest in America List - NewsBreak
text:
Texas
These 2 Texas Cities Just Made the Dirtiest in America List
By Iris Lopez,
3 hours agoTexas is a beautiful state, and yes that may be my biased opinion cause I’m from Texas, but there’s a new survey that is trying to trash my state, literally!!. A new list of the Dirtiest Cities in America just got released and Texas is not looking too fresh.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->business reporting and performance

author: Martin Reyes
title: Malware en la Play Store: borra estas apps que instalaste o tomarán control de tu celular | Google | Android | Smartphone | La República
text: Malware en la Play Store: borra estas apps que instalaste o tomarán control de tu celular Son varias las aplicaciones de la Google Play Store que están infectadas y si todavía las tienes instaladas en tu teléfono, corres un gran riesgo. ¿Cuáles son? Esta es la lista completa. [Adiós MIUI: Xiaomi publica lista de teléfonos que se actualizarán a HyperOS en el 2024](https://larepublica.pe/tecnologia/smartphone/2023/12/23/adios-miui-xiaomi-publica-lista-de-telefonos-que-se-actualizaran-a-hyperos-en-el-2024-811854) [¿Qué pasó con CCleaner, el software que limpiaba tu PC y que millones habían instalado?](https://larepublica.pe/tecnologia/actualidad/2023/12/20/por-que-decayo-ccleaner-el-programa-que-limpiaba-tu-pc-y-que-tenia-millones-de-usuarios-374360) En la actualidad, la Google Play Store [es la tienda oficial de aplicaciones que se encuentra incorporada](https://larepublica.pe/tecnologia/actualidad/2023/12/28/como-comprobar-si-el-enlace-que-recibiste-por-sms-o-correo-busca-robar-tu-informacion-personal-305172) de forma nativa en los dispositivos móviles con sistema operativo Android. Por lo [mismo que en la plataforma los usuarios descargan todo tipo desoftwares](https://larepublica.pe/tecnologia/actualidad/2023/12/28/bai-como-acceder-a-la-ia-de-veterinario-virtual-integrado-que-resuelve-dudas-por-whatsapp-chatbot-wsp-1071252), los ciberdelincuentes diseñan malwares que se hacen pasar por servicios inofensivos, pero en realidad te roban información sensible sin que te des cuenta de ello. Al respecto, McAfee acaba de reportar que 13 nuevas apps aprovechan las vulnerabilidades de los dispositivos para hackearte. Como tal, el software malicioso en cuestión se conoce como Xamalicious y utiliza una técnica de ingeniería social para obtener accesos en los móviles. Se especializa en la ejecución de acciones fraudulentas para, principalmente, robar dinero cuando hagas clic en anuncios o al instalar aplicativos. PUEDES VER: [Bai: ¿cómo acceder a la IA de ‘veterinario virtual integrado’ que resuelve dudas por WhatsApp?] Lista de apps infectadas El malware Xamalicious está presente en cerca de 25 aplicaciones de la Play Store. Google ya tomó cartas en el asunto al eliminarlas, pero es probable que todavía las tengas instaladas en tu smartphones. ¿Cuáles son? Estas son algunas de las apps que debes eliminar cuanto antes: - Horóscopo Esencial para Android. - Editor de máscaras 3D para PE Minecraft. - Logo Maker Pro. - Repetidor de clic automático. - Calculadora fácil de contar calorías. - Extensor de volumen de sonido. - LetterLink. - Numerología: Horóscopo personal y predicciones de números. - Step Keeper: Podómetro fácil. - Realice un seguimiento de su sueño. - Amplificador de volumen de sonido. - Navegador Astrológico: Horóscopo Diario y Tarot. - Calculadora universal. PUEDES VER: [¿Cómo comprobar si el enlace que recibiste por SMS o correo busca robar tu información personal?] Entre las aplicaciones que detallamos, varias acumulan más de 100.000 descargas, por lo que es probable que estén infiltradas en tu celular. ¿Cómo saber si el malware ya actúa en tu teléfono? Puedes notar que tu celular está infectado si la batería se agota más rápido de lo normal, se sobrecalienta, aparecen aplicaciones que no conoces, tu micrófono y cámara se encienden de un momento a otro y si se reinicia sin que aprietes algún botón. Bachiller en Comunicación y periodismo en la Universidad Peruana de Ciencias Aplicadas. Maestrando en Periodismo y Comunicación Multimedia en la Universidad San Martin de Porres. Redactor de la sección Tecnología en La República. Con experiencia profesional en redacción, locución y fotografía. Cargando MgId...

author: Brieanna Charlebois; The Canadian Press
title: B.C. civil lawsuit against Sex Pistols guitarist alleges 1980 sexual assault
text:
VANCOUVER — A Vancouver woman has filed a civil lawsuit against Paramount Pictures Corp. and punk rocker Stephen Jones of The Sex Pistols alleging he sexually assaulted her as a teenager while she was a movie extra more than 40 years ago.
A B.C. Supreme Court statement of claim filed by the plaintiff says she was 14 years old and working on the movie "Ladies & Gentlemen, The Fabulous Stains" when Jones supplied her with marijuana, then sexually assaulted her in his hotel room.
The court has placed a publication ban on the woman's name.
Her lawyer Jason Gratl said in an interview that he could not comment about why the lawsuit was brought 44 years after the alleged events.
"I only wanted to say one thing and it's that she kept a diary," Gratl said.
The notice of claim filed Wednesday says Paramount didn't take adequate steps to warn minors or their parents about the risks of working on the set with Jonesor impose contractual terms restricting his contact with young extras or using illicit drugs.
None of the allegations have been tested in court.
Paramount did not immediately return a request for comment. Jones could not be reached for comment.
Neither Paramount, nor Jones have filed a statement of defence.
The lawsuit says Paramount hired Jones, who was 24 at the time, for a role in the film because of his reputation as a "punk rocker" who consumed excessive amounts of drugs and alcohol, and engaged in sexual misconduct, including with underage girls.
"The defendant Paramount was banking on the defendant Jones’ reputation and history to market 'The Fabulous Stains,'" the statement says, adding the company "also hired other well-known punk rock musicians as actors for the same purpose."
The statement says that despite this knowledge, the company did not take steps to protect young workers.
The movie, about disaffected teens in a punk rock band, was released in 1982.
The legal action says the woman is seeking damages, claiming the alleged assault "caused her to suffer psychological injury, including loss of self-esteem, loss of self-worth, injurious self-imaging and identity, and loss of trust in intimacy and potential partners."
The lawsuit says she was hired as one of the hundreds of extras playing fans for the all-girl feminist rock band. Jones had been hired to play the role of a "socially volatile punk rock guitar player in a fictitious all-male band, The Looters."
It says that on April 13, 1980, the teen went to the Denman Inn, "a location under the direction and control" of Paramount, with the intention of inviting the movie's lead actor, Diane Lane, to go roller skating.
When she entered the lobby, it says Jones approached her, told her he had Lane's number in his hotel room and asked her to go with him to get it. Once they were inside his room, it says Jones gave her marijuana, and he then turned off the lights and closed the curtains.
The document says she understood that meant he was likely to make sexual advances, she told Jones she did not consent and was "only 14, 1-4." It says despite this, he pulled her onto his bed, climbed on top of her then kissed and molested her.
"The plaintiff repeatedly and expressly told the defendant Jones 'no' and tried to move his hand away, and finally wriggled free from him and left the room," the notice of claim says.
The lawsuit says she was initially "both repulsed and flattered by this unwanted sexual attention from someone she believed to be a rock star and movie star."
Because she was confused by what had happened, the document says she did not tell her parents and it wasn't until she was older that she "felt sexually violated and sexually ashamed and angry" about the alleged assault.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published April 25, 2024.
Brieanna Charlebois, The Canadian Press

author: 界面快报
title: 甘肃省防汛抗旱指挥部办公室启动防汛抗洪三级应急响应
text:
7月2日至3日，陇南市、天水市、平凉市、庆阳市出现强降雨天气，陇南市局地出现大暴雨。目前，强降雨仍在持续。
按照《甘肃省防汛抗洪应急预案》，经会商研判，甘肃省防汛抗旱指挥部办公室决定于7月3日11时启动省级防汛抗洪三级应急响应。
甘肃省防汛抗旱指挥部办公室要求相关市州及有关部门要根据预案规定和职责分工，迅速响应做好相关工作。各级各有关部门要严格落实24小时防汛值班制度，及时收发预警信息，密切监视雨情汛情，掌握了解灾情及应急救援工作动态，及时汇总上报信息，全力做好各项应急处置工作。
来源：界面新闻
7月2日至3日，陇南市、天水市、平凉市、庆阳市出现强降雨天气，陇南市局地出现大暴雨。目前，强降雨仍在持续。
按照《甘肃省防汛抗洪应急预案》，经会商研判，甘肃省防汛抗旱指挥部办公室决定于7月3日11时启动省级防汛抗洪三级应急响应。
甘肃省防汛抗旱指挥部办公室要求相关市州及有关部门要根据预案规定和职责分工，迅速响应做好相关工作。各级各有关部门要严格落实24小时防汛值班制度，及时收发预警信息，密切监视雨情汛情，掌握了解灾情及应急救援工作动态，及时汇总上报信息，全力做好各项应急处置工作。
